attributes.action: require all Israeli visitors to obtain a visa before travelling to the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Israelis need visas to work or study in the UK but they do not need visas to visit the UK for up to 6 months.

UK citizens need a visa to stay in Israel longer than 3 months, evidence of entry into Israel in their passport to enter the Occupied Territories and a multiple entry visa to enter Gaza under normal circumstances.

By making Israeli citizens apply for visas for visits, it would enable the UK to ensure that those Israelis committing war crimes in Gaza could be denied entry.

Furthermore, by inconveniencing Israeli citizens who wish to visit the UK, it sends them a message that the British government does not agree with the treatment of Palestinians by their elected government.

rejection.details: Your basic request is acceptable but your reference to war crimes is not. To date there has been no conviction regarding war crimes as you allege.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
